tools.tool-name: Glass or metal container for the drippings

steplist.summary: 1. Lay out bacon on a pan
steplist.step: 1. Before turning on the heat, lay out bacon strips on a cold pan.
2. Cook the bacon on low heat. When it starts to buckle and curl, use the tongs to turn each strip to cook on the other side.
3. Turn off the heat and pour off the grease into a glass or metal container
4. Cook until the bacon is done, it should be evenly brown
5. Let the cooked bacon drain. Using the tongs, remove pieces from the pan and onto the paper towels to drain
1. Beat 4 eggs, 1/4 cup milk, salt and pepper in medium bowl until blended.
2. Heat 2 teaspoon butter in a skillet over medium heat until hot
3. Pour in egg mixture, as they begin to set, pull the eggs across the pan with a spatula forming large soft curds
4. Continue to pull, lift, and fold the eggs until no liquid egg remains. Remove from heat and serve
1. Beat 1 egg, 1 teaspoon vanilla and 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon in shallow dish. Stir in 1/4 cup milk.
2. Dip bread in egg mixture, turning to coat both sides evenly.
3. Cook bread slices on lightly greased nonstick griddle or skillet on medium heat until browned on both sides.

ingredients.ingredient-name: 1/4 cup liquid, milk, tomato juice, broth

steplist.step: 1. Beat 4 eggs, 1/4 liquid, herb and salt and pepper in medium bowl until blended. Add 1 cup filling; mix well.

steplist.summary: 2. Heating the skillet and cooking the eggs
steplist.step: 2. Heat 2 teaspoon butter in skillet on medium heat and pour in egg mixture to cook over low to medium heat for 8 to 10 minutes
3. Remove from heat. Cover and let the eggs stand for 5 to 10 minutes

ingredients.ingredient-name: 1 cup fresh flat-leaf parsley leaves, coarsely chopped
1/4 cup fresh cilantro leaves, coarsely chopped

steplist.summary: 1. Putting chickpeas with water in refrigerator
steplist.step: 1. Put the chickpeas in a large bowl and cover with water to refrigerate overngight

steplist.summary: 2. Draining the chickpease and mixing it with ingredients
steplist.step: 2. Drain the chickpeas and toss in a large bowl with 1 clove garlic and 1 onion. Run the mixture through blade of a meat grinder
3. Toss chickpea mixture with other vegetables and run through meat grinder again
4. Heat 4 inches of oil to 350 degrees fahrenheit in a large pot over medium heat
5. Shape falafel mixture into balls using tablespoon and fry until browned
6. Drain on a paper towel and serve with pita, cucumber, tomato, parsley, tahini

steplist.summary: 1. Heating oil in soup pot and stirring in vegetables
steplist.step: 1. In soup pot, heat oil over medium heat. Add all the onions, carrots, celery. Cook until onion is tender. Stir in all the garlic, bay leaf, oregan, basil, and cook for 2 minutes
2. Stir in 2 cups lentils and add water and 1 can of tomatoes. Bring to a boil
3. Reduce heat and simmer for 1 hour. When ready to serve, stir in all the spinach and stir in vinegar. Season to taste with salt and pepper
1. Salt and pepper both sides of the pork chops
2. Combine all the flour and some cayenne, salt and black pepper. Dredge each side of the pork chops in the flour mixture, and then set aside on a plate.

3. Heat the canola oil over medium to medium-high heat. Add 1 tablespoon butter. When the butter is melted and the butter/oil mixture is hot, cook 3 pork chops at a time, 2 to 3 minutes on the first side.

steplist.summary: 4. Flipping and cooking the pork chops
steplist.step: 4. Flip and cook until the chops are golden brown on the other side, 1 to 2 minutes

steplist.summary: 5. Remove to a plate and repeate with other pork chops
steplist.step: 5. Remove to a plate and repeat with the remaining pork chops.
6. Serve with the 2 cups smashed potatoes
1. Preheat barbecue grill.
2. Combine all seasonings in small bowl and mix well.
3. Melt 3 tablespoons butter in small saucepan over medium heat and pour into pie plate.

steplist.summary: 4. Dipping sea bass into melted butter
steplist.step: 4. Dip sea bass into melted butter, evenly coating both sides.

steplist.summary: 5. Sprinkle sea bass with seasoning mixture
steplist.step: 5. Sprinkle both sides of sea bass with seasoning mixture.
6. Place on grill and cook covered for approximately 6 to 8 minutes or until it is blackened and flakes easily.

steplist.summary: 7. Turning it halfway through grilling time
steplist.step: 7. Turn halfway through grilling time.

steplist.summary: 8. Serve with lemon and dill sprigs
steplist.step: 8. Serve with your desired amount of lemon and garnish with dill sprigs.

steplist.summary: 1. Combining ingrdients in a large bowl
steplist.step: 1. Combine 1/3 cup panko and the 10 ingredients up to egg listed on the tools and ingredients page earlier, in a large bowl.
2. Add the 8 ounce salmon and stir and place 1/3 cup panko in a shallow dish.

steplist.summary: 3. Shaping salmon mixture into balls and patties
steplist.step: 3. Using wet hands, shape salmon mixture into 4 equal balls. Coat balls in panko and flatten balls to 4 inch patties
4. Heat a large nonstick skillet over medium to high heat
5. Add 1 tablespoon oil to the pan and swirl to coat.
6. Add patties and cook 3 minutes on each side.
7. Use 1 lemon to serve with lemon wedges
1. Heat 4 cups chicken stock to a simmer in a medium saucepan, then lower the heat so the stock stays hot.

steplist.summary: 2. Heating oil and adding chopped ingredients
steplist.step: 2. In a large saucepan, heat 1 tablespoon oil and 1 tablespoon of the butter over medium heat. When the butter has melted, add the 1 medium chopped shallot or onion. Sauté for 2 to 3 minutes.

steplist.summary: 3. Adding rice and wine to the pan
steplist.step: 3. Add 1 1/2 cup arborio rice to the pan and stir it with a wooden spoon. Sauté for one minute and add 1/2 cup vermouth until it's fully absorbed.

steplist.summary: 4. Adding chicken stock to the rice and stir
steplist.step: 4. Add a ladle of hot chicken stock to the rice and stir until the liquid is fully absorbed. When the rice is almost dry, add another ladle of stock and repeat the process.

steplist.summary: 5. Ading chicken stock at time intervals
steplist.step: 5. Continue adding stock, a ladle at a time, for 20 to 30 minutes.

steplist.summary: 6. Add hot water if chicken stock runs out
steplist.step: 6. If you run out of stock and the risotto still isn't done, you can finish the cooking using hot water, adding a ladle at a time.
7. Stir in the remaining 2 tablespoons butter, the Parmesan cheese, and the parsley, and season with with Kosher salt.

ingredients.ingredient-name: 1 (17.5 ounce) package frozen puff pastry, thawed

steplist.step: 1. Preheat the oven to 425 degrees Fahrenheit.
2. Place 2 1/2 pound beef in a small baking dish, and spread 2 tablespoons softened butter. Bake for 10 to 15 minutes. Remove from pan, and let it cool completely.
3. Melt 2 tablespoons butter in skillet over medium heat. Saute all the onion and mushrooms for 5 minutes. Remove from heat and let it cool.
4. Mix pate and 2 tablespoons softened butter, salt, pepper. Spread pate over beef with onion and mushroom mixture.
5. Roll out pastry dough and put beef in the center. Fold up and seal all edges. Place beef in a 9 by 13 inch baking dish, and brush with egg yolk.
6. Bake at 450 degrees Fahrenheit for 10 minutes, then heat to 425 degrees Fahrenheit for 10 to 15 minutes. Set it aside then keep warm.
7. Stir in beef stock, red wine, and the leftover beef juices over high heat in a small saucepan. Boil for 10 to 15 minutes and serve with the beef.

ingredients.ingredient-name: 1 cup carrot, cut into 1 inch slices
1 cup celery, cut into 1 inch slices
3 medium potatoes, cut into 1 inch chunks

steplist.step: 1. Heat 1 tablespoon vegetable oil in a large, saucepan over medium heat.
2. Add all the onions, garlic, carrots, celery, and mushrooms.
3. Cook 10 minutes, stirring frequently.
4. Add small amounts of water, if necessary, to prevent sticking.
5. Add remaining ingredients, except flour, 1/4 cup water, and wine.
6. Cover, reduce heat to low, and simmer 30 minutes, or until vegetables are tender.
7. Stir occasionally while cooking.

steplist.summary: 8. Stirring flour and water in a bowl
steplist.step: 8. In a small bowl, gradually stir flour into 1/4 cup water until smooth.

steplist.summary: 9. Adding mix and wine to stew
steplist.step: 9. Add to stew, along with wine.
10. Cook, stirring for 5 more minutes.
11. Remove and discard bay leaf before serving.

ingredients.ingredient-name: 1 3/4 cups HONEY MAID Graham Cracker Crumbs
3 (8 ounce) packages PHILADELPHIA Cream Cheese, softened
1 cup BREAKSTONE'S or KNUDSEN Sour Cream

steplist.step: 1. Heat oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit
2. Mix 1 3/4 cups graham crumbs, 1/3 cup butter and 1/4 cup sugar; press onto bottom of 9-inch springform pan.
3. Beat all the cream cheese and remaining sugar in large bowl with mixer until blended. Add 1 cup sour cream and 2 tablespoons vanilla.
4. Add eggs, 1 at a time, beating on low speed after each addition just until blended. Pour over crust.
5. Bake 1 hour to 1 hour 10 minute or until center is almost set. Run knife around rim of pan to loosen cake; cool before removing rim. Refrigerate cheesecake 4 hours.

steplist.summary: 6. Adding pie filling to the top
steplist.step: 6. Top with pie filling before serving.

steplist.summary: 1. Mixing ingredients in a small bowl
steplist.step: 1. In a small bowl, combine 3/4 cup cracker crumbs, 2 tablespoons sugar and 2 tablespoons butter.
2. Divide among 8 dessert dishes, about 4 teaspoonfuls each.
3. In a small bowl, beat all the cream cheese until smooth. Gradually, add the 1 can milk until blended.

steplist.summary: 4. Adding in lemon juice and vanilla
steplist.step: 4. Beat in 1/3 cup lemon juice and 1 tablespoon vanilla and spoon 1/4 cup into each dish.
5. Top wih pie filling, about 1/4 cup in each.

steplist.summary: 1. Mixing ingredients in a large dish
steplist.step: 1. In a large dish mix together 1/2 granulated sugar and 1 tablespoon cinnamon. Set to the side.
2. In a large skillet heat 1 cup canola oil until bubbly and hot.
3. Place one tortilla in the skillet cook for 10 seconds then using tongs flip over, and  begin to fold in half.
4. Continue to hold one side of the tortilla with tongs. Then flip to ensure the other side cooks evenly. Remove from the skillet
5. Dip both sides in the cinnamon sugar and sprinkle cinnamon sugar in the inside of the taco shell.
6. Once the taco shells are cooked, chop 1 cup fresh strawberries and rinse half cup raspberries. Place them off to the side.

steplist.summary: 7. Mixing cream and powdered sugar in stand mixer
steplist.step: 7. Add 1 cup heavy cream and 1/4 cup powdered sugar to a stand mixer with a whisk attachment and whip for about 1 minute.

steplist.summary: 8. Placing mixture in a piping bag
steplist.step: 8. Place in a piping bag or a ziplock baggy and cut a corner tip off to pipe.

steplist.summary: 9. Adding nutella into a ziplock baggy
steplist.step: 9. Add Nutella into a ziplock baggy and cut one side of the corner with scissors.
10. Pipe the nutella evenly and add in fruit. Lastly, add whipped cream on top.
1. Toast the bread slices.
2. Spread a thin layer of 1/4 cup mayonnaise on each slice.
3. Layer bottom slice with the letuce, tomato, turkey, bacon, cheese

steplist.summary: 4. Adding second slice of bread on top
steplist.step: 4. Put the second slice of bread on top.
5. Heat in microwave for 30 seconds to 1 minute, or until cheese is melted.
1. On medium heat melt 3 tablespoons butter and sautee 1 onion and the chopped bell peppers.
2. Add the hamburger meat and cook until meat is well done.
3. Add 2 cans tomato sauce, 1 teaspoon salt and pepper and 2 tablespoons garlic powder.
4. Cook the noodles as directed on the label.
5. Mix the sauce and noodles.

ingredients.ingredient-name: 1 cup Old El Paso Thick 'n Chunky Salsa

steplist.step: 1. Cook beef in 10-inch skillet over medium heat 8 to 10 minutes, stirring occasionally until brown.
2. Stir your desired amount of salsa into beef. Heat to boiling, stirring constantly; reduce heat to medium-low.
3. Cook 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Pour beef mixture into large serving bowl.

steplist.summary: 4. Heating taco shells and serve with meat
steplist.step: 4. Heat taco shells as directed on package. Serve taco shells with beef mixture, lettuce, tomato and cheese.
